title: Selecting Columns
description: Columns are the dependant variables you are charting. They are the columns of number values in a dataset. In this problem, try out each of the selected column blocks to see each bar cart that is generated. If you need a reminder of the header names and data, look over the penguins.csv dataset.
hint: Drag in one of the selected column blocks. This block should be placed after the data frame loads in the data and before the chart object is created from the data frame. Run the program to explore the bar chart. To explore other bar charts, stop the program, delete the selected column block, and add a different block.
